member.name: ISpatialAudioObjectForMetadataCommands.WriteNextMetadataCommand
member.summary: Writes a metadata command to the spatial audio object, each command may only be added once per object per processing cycle. Valid commands and value lengths are defined by the metadata format specified in the when the was created.
member.param: The ID of the metadata command.
The buffer containing the value data for the metadata command.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK.

summary.para: Used to write metadata commands for spatial audio. Valid commands and value lengths are defined by the metadata format specified in the when the was created.
This interface is a part of Windows Sonic, Microsoft’s audio platform for more immersive audio which includes integrated spatial sound on Xbox and Windows.
